Uses of Package
com.ibm.itim.authentication

Packages that use com.ibm.itim.authentication
com.ibm.itim.apps Provides a remotable application programming interface for provisioning specific functions. 
com.ibm.itim.authentication Provides an application programming interface for authentication that supports different trusted identity stores. 
com.ibm.itim.authentication.system Contains an implementation of the Authenticator interface. 
com.ibm.itim.webclient.logon Provides the classes that mediate the logon process and any steps that need to occur when a user logs onto the system. 
 

Classes in com.ibm.itim.authentication used by com.ibm.itim.apps
Credentials
          Credentials is a class that extends the Hashtable class for holding a user's credentials for authentication.
 

Classes in com.ibm.itim.authentication used by com.ibm.itim.authentication
AuthenticationException
          AuthenticationException is a class that extends the Exception class for identifying exceptions that are originated from within the Authentication package.
AuthenticationFailedException
          AuthenticationFailedException is a class that extends the AuthenticationException class for identifying authentication failure exceptions.
AuthenticationProvider
          AuthenticationProvider is an interface for authenticating a user using a specific implementation of a specific authentication mechanism.
Authenticator
          Authenticator is an interface for authenticating a user given a set of user credentials.
ConfigurationException
          ConfigurationException is a class that extends the AuthenticationException class for identifying configuration exceptions.
Credentials
          Credentials is a class that extends the Hashtable class for holding a user's credentials for authentication.

          Authenticator is an interface for authenticating a user given a set of user credentials.

          ConfigurationException is a class that extends the AuthenticationException class for identifying configuration exceptions.

          Credentials is a class that extends the Hashtable class for holding a user's credentials for authentication.
